exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros l m z. split. - intro H. induction l. + simpl in H. apply H. + simpl. right. apply IHl. apply H. - intro H. simpl in H. destruct H. + induction l. * simpl. apply H. * simpl. apply IHl. apply H. + simpl in H. apply H.
